heroVideo.title: I secure & grow your business IT
heroVideo.subtitle: Professional IT support, websites, network setup & cybersecurity for SMEs

hero.subtitle: I provide professional IT support, network setup, cybersecurity, and websites tailored for small and medium businesses.

analyze.title: Assess
analyze.text: I start by understanding your company's current IT environment, identifying weaknesses, bottlenecks, and potential security risks. This allows me to propose practical solutions aligned with your business objectives.

plan.title: Plan
plan.text: Based on the assessment, I create a clear IT roadmap. This includes network design, hardware and software selection, cybersecurity strategy, and step-by-step implementation planning to ensure reliability and scalability.

build.title: Implement
build.text: I bring your IT infrastructure to life, setting up secure networks, servers, workstations, and websites. Every component is configured for optimal performance, security, and future growth.

support.title: Support
support.text: After deployment, I provide ongoing IT support, monitoring, and maintenance. This ensures your systems remain secure, updated, and fully operational, letting you focus on your business.

services.title: IT solutions that keep your business running

webDesign.title: Website Design & Hosting
webDesign.description: I create responsive, secure, and high-performing websites for your business that reflect your brand and attract customers.

faq1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
faq1.answer: Most business websites are completed within 4â€“6 weeks depending on complexity.

faq2.question: Do you offer website maintenance?
faq2.answer: Yes, I provide ongoing updates, backups, and security monitoring.

faq3.question: Can you redesign an existing website?
faq3.answer: Absolutely. I update designs, improve security, and optimize performance.

faq4.question: Do you provide e-commerce solutions?
faq4.answer: Yes, I can integrate online shops and payment gateways.

faq5.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
faq5.answer: Yes, all websites are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices.

faq6.question: Can you help with website SEO?
faq6.answer: Yes, I provide on-page SEO optimization and performance improvements.

itSupport.title: IT Support for SMEs
itSupport.description: Reliable IT support for your company, including troubleshooting, hardware & software management, and user assistance.

faq1.question: Do you provide on-site support?
faq1.answer: Yes, I offer both on-site and remote IT support depending on your needs.

faq2.question: Can you manage our office computers?
faq2.answer: Yes, I handle all workstations, software installations, and updates.

faq3.question: Do you offer emergency support?
faq3.answer: Absolutely. I provide rapid response for urgent IT issues.

faq4.question: Do you provide IT training for employees?
faq4.answer: Yes, I can provide training to improve digital skills and security awareness.

faq5.question: Do you manage software licenses?
faq5.answer: Yes, I manage licenses, updates, and compliance for your business software.

faq6.question: Can you monitor our IT systems 24/7?
faq6.answer: Yes, I offer continuous monitoring and alerts for critical systems.

networkSetup.title: Network & Infrastructure
networkSetup.description: I design and implement secure and scalable networks, including wired and wireless setups, VPNs, and server architecture.

faq1.question: Do you set up office networks from scratch?
faq1.answer: Yes, I design and implement new networks tailored to your business size and needs.

faq2.question: Can you optimize an existing network?
faq2.answer: Absolutely. I can improve performance, security, and reliability.

faq3.question: Do you manage network security?
faq3.answer: Yes, I implement firewalls, access controls, and monitoring tools to keep your network safe.

faq4.question: Can you configure VPN access for remote employees?
faq4.answer: Yes, I provide secure VPN setups for remote work.

faq5.question: Do you provide network monitoring?
faq5.answer: Yes, I monitor network performance, uptime, and troubleshoot issues proactively.

faq6.question: Can you recommend hardware for our network?
faq6.answer: Yes, I provide advice and installation for routers, switches, and servers.

cyberSecurity.title: Cybersecurity
cyberSecurity.description: Protect your business with comprehensive cybersecurity services including risk assessment, threat prevention, and compliance.

faq1.question: How do you protect against cyber attacks?
faq1.answer: I implement firewalls, antivirus, regular updates, and monitoring to reduce risk.

faq2.question: Do you provide employee training?
faq2.answer: Yes, I offer cybersecurity awareness training to prevent human error.

faq3.question: Can you secure our cloud services?
faq3.answer: Absolutely. I secure cloud platforms and ensure compliance with best practices.

faq4.question: Do you provide penetration testing?
faq4.answer: Yes, I perform ethical hacking tests to identify vulnerabilities.

faq5.question: Can you help with GDPR compliance?
faq5.answer: Yes, I ensure your IT setup aligns with data protection regulations.

faq6.question: Do you offer continuous monitoring?
faq6.answer: Yes, I provide 24/7 monitoring for potential cyber threats.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Contact me today to discuss your IT needs and get a customized solution.
